omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	NHS_Number,
	max (Patient_Postcode) as Patient_Postcode,
	max (Date_Of_Birth) as Date_Of_Birth
from omop_staging.sact_staging
group by NHS_Number

omopColumns.name: zip
omopColumns.operation_description: Uppercase the postcode then insert the space in the correct location, if needed.
omopColumns.query:
select
	NHS_Number,
	max (Patient_Postcode) as Patient_Postcode,
	max (Date_Of_Birth) as Date_Of_Birth
from omop_staging.sact_staging
group by NHS_Number

omopColumns.name: location_source_value
omopColumns.query:
select
	NHS_Number,
	max (Patient_Postcode) as Patient_Postcode,
	max (Date_Of_Birth) as Date_Of_Birth
from omop_staging.sact_staging
group by NHS_Number
